We are still in the season of brand launches. The hotel groups are still developing new brands and launching them on the market place.

item.title: Another month - another set of New Brand Launches

We are completing another month and we have a set of announcements relating to the launching of new brands within the hotel industry.

item.title: Welcome to 2016.
item.description:
Welcome to 2016.

I would like to take this opportunity to wish you all a Happy New Year 2016 and hope that it brings you all health and happiness.
